components.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

annotations.text: This Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) document was created on Monday, December 1, 2025 with cdxgen. The lifecycles phases represented are: pre-build and post-build. The document describes a container named 'sbom-bench/python-flask-lvthillo' with version '1.0'. There are 75 components. The linux image uses the amd64 architecture and has the registry tag sbom-bench/python-flask-lvthillo:1.0. The OS components are of types alpine, alpine-3.22, alpine-3.22.2, and apk. 3 package type(s) and 1 purl namespaces are described in the document under components.
